author: Keith Zubot-Gephart
comment: I love the look, but it isn't compatible with my Q Explorist apparently? I'm going to miss it!

author: Godracos Mystclaw
comment: Love the watchface but since the 2.0 update on my watch I can't set it up anymore. I can choose the watchface​ in the menu but when I want to set up for example the color it tries to open something. It then freezes and the only possibility to get out is to press the crown. Would be awesome if it got fixed.

author: Marko Cekić
comment: its a very cool watch face and all but the on watch watch face settings are completley broken(moto 360 1st gen) and when i want to set the 3 tap app on my phone the preinstaled stopwatch didnt show up please fix and ill give u 5 stars but all in all 100% would recomend to everyone

author: Jurriaan de Groot
comment: I really like the look of this watch face and the customizability. Being able to keep track of the battery % of both my phone and watch is great. A feature I'd love to see, is the option to randomize the colour every month/week/day/hour/whenever I look. I can't currently modify the colors through my watch itself with Wear 2.0, looking forward to an update.

author: Marius Böpple
comment: Multi select settings are not working correctly on my moto 360 2nd gen

author: Jackson Ng
comment: Look very nice. But got error during customisation...can't choose the settings. Would be great if there is a fix!!!

author: Billy Anthony Tohar
comment: Installed it on my 1st gen moto 360, it works but thats about it. I cannot change any of the settings at all. Everytime i tap the settings it just shows a blank box. It just sort of freeze. Had to wait until my watch turn off the display.

author: Pete Simpson
comment: This is a great idea but on my LG Watch Urbane, the watch face settings on the watch itself do not all work, I have have to use the app on the phone to set the watch.  Currently running Android Wear 2.5 and Android OS 7.1.  Thank you...

author: Michael Smith
comment: Managed to get it working on my urbane after some messing I like it I'd basic so well save me battery life

author: Laiane Peixoto
comment: Menu does not work. It froze every time a try to change the settings on my ticwatch e.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content: Use Android wear app on your phone to adjust the settings

author: Sripurna Mutalik
comment: A little buggy! Doesn't show correct battery level of watch & sometimes of the phone too.

author: Nafis Ali
comment: Love this watch face. Configuration works from Android Wear app. Configuring from watch crashes.  Great customization options.

author: Donald Grant
comment: Freezes Everytime I try to do anything. Ticwatch E running Android 2.0

author: Vaughn Goy
comment: This is I've of my absolute favorite watch faces on my Zen watch unfortunately it doesn't show up on my LG watch style wear 2.0 I've tried resynccing multiple times to no avail.

author: Bear Gordon
comment: It looks ok but setting bugged on moto 360 sport.

author: J Chase
comment: Looks nice, but settings are broken on the watch, and work only thru the Android Wear app. Please fix!

author: iSO W
comment: Watch battery is not correct , pls fix it !

author: Lee Morby
comment: Cannot change any of the settings. Shame, looks quite nice. UPDATE..... You have to use Android Wear to alter settings. (after contact from Dev)

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Thank you Lee for your comment,
Anthony

author: Daniel S
comment: would freeze trying to change settings...

author: Dale Taylor
comment: Nice and easy to read. Simple design but the old ways are the best. Very retro 😀

author: De-Leon Chen
comment: Settings does not work on AW2.7

author: Jeff Knox
comment: Looks great, but can't access any settings on Moto 360 v2 with Wear 2.0.

author: EZKL Dominguez
comment: Battery on the watch doesn't update anymore and i cannot change the settings on the watch itself.

author: Kevin Roarty
comment: Nice looking face but I can't edit it to change colours etc so deleted

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content: Use the Android Wear app on your phone to adjust the settings

author: Stuyvenstein
comment: This is by far the best watch face for me. Simple and retro geeky. Good job :)

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Thank you Stephan for your comment! 
Anthony

author: Poom Secrets
comment: V. 1.18 can't change font color on SmartWatch3

author: Randy Henry
comment: Cannot edit settings on watch - freezes the watch every time

author: Taka Zvetc
comment: crashes. horrible.

author: Rhys Hou
comment: great watch face, with a lot of customization.

author: Marcus Mues
comment: This watch face is great! It has all the features I was looking for, and looks fantastic. I've seen other people mention this - the 3 tap app starter doesn't seem to recognize all the apps I have. I would very much like to start the "flashlight" on my watch with the 3 tap quick launch, but it does not appear in my choices. Otherwise, everything works just fine!

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Marcus! Thanks for your comment! I will try to enhance the app selector soon.
Anthony

author: James Fieldsend
comment: Very customisable, which I love. Can get just the attic that I want. Only two issues: 1) Can't assign in built apps (such as torch or timer) to triple tap. 2) Transition animations are slow, often activating right when I wake up my watch, making me wait before I can see the time. Would be nice if I could disable those.
title: Great

author: Kelley McChesney
comment: This is a really nice watch face and I love it. The only reason why I am rating it 3 stars though is that for some reason the mobile phone percentage seems to be stuck at 77%. Both restarting the phone and the watch don't seem to fix it. If you fix this, I will quickly change my rating to 5 stars.

author: Ajay Borkar
comment: I like this watchface alot. It looks great on my 1st gen Moto 360. I only took a point off because I was hoping that we could choose more apps off the 3 touch option. Also I would like an option to use an image from my phone as a background and have it be pixelated in appearance.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hy Ajay. Thanks for your comment.
What do you wanna say by "choose more apps" ?? Pixels Watchface is displaying all the availalbe apps on your watch.
I'm sorry but I wont display any picture on the watchface, since I just wanna keep its look & feel.
Anthony

title: Very Cool

author: David Biscan
comment: Notified me to remind me to buy it. I don't use it and surely won't now. It wasn't good. Uninstalled.  Edit: Anthony, I used it once to see what it looked like and I didn't like it. After not thinking about it again your app decided to notify me LOUDLY while I was in a meeting to remind me to buy it. First, you don't know if I'm using it, secondly, "reminding" someone to buy something that you offer for free is a pretty dick move. Maybe if you want to sell it don't give it out for free? I'm pretty sure if i wanted the extra functionality I would have paid by now. It's even fine if you advertise that you can upgrade on the watch face...but notifications?!? unprofessional.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi David, thanks for your feedback. I've never hear that, since Pixel WatchFace should only send one a one unique notification to advertise that a Donate version exists. It's probably a bug because I purely dislike the app which spams its users. Be sure I'll fix that really soon.
Anthony

author: Austin Hall
comment: This is a very pretty and simplistic watch face! I only have 1 question. On my watch face, it has these stats that say "W:71%   M:57%" and I am unsure what those are. Other than that, I give this a full star rating. 4 stars for being very pretty, +1 star for being free!

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Austin, W is for wear battery, M is for mobile battery ;) 
Anthony

title: Very well done!

author: Mark Daly
comment: All these people having problems and giving 1 star need to switch to iPhone because clearly you have the mental capacity of a 3yr old if you can't get it to work. I managed to setup how I like it in about 3 mins.
title: Works perfectly thanks.

author: Trea Huggs
comment: The watch and options are great. However there are a few things that I wish were included, being able to adjust text size, battery status bars went from top to bottom(instead of middle), but most importantly weather. I'm huge on wanting quick glance at the temp/forecast on my watch. If I can't do something that makes my life easier, what's the point of having a smart watch?
title: Could be my daily very easily with an update

author: Demetry Gutierrez
comment: Not all dots line up, especially with the date.  Also, why show unused dots.  Pretty pointless as you can't make them black and therefore they take up battery power to display.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Demetry. You simple have to make them black if you want to dismiss the unused dots, so they will be not drawn anymore. 
If they are not black by default is because I think it looks better that way. 
Anthony

title: Needs a lot of work

author: Omar Ali
comment: My favorite watch face, using it on the Moto 360 2.0. Only thing missing is extra customisability.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi! Thanks for your comment! I think there are already a lot of option in this watchface! Don't you? 
Anthony

author: Thomas Ede
comment: So it's a brilliant face but recently the mobile battery does not update. There's also an error in the settings for the digital battery where it doesn't update the tickbox
